mapper.select: select id, name, resource_type, url, permission, parent_id, parent_ids, available,img_url from sys_permission order by id
mapper.update: update sys_permission set parent_id=0, parent_ids='0' where parent_id=#{parentId}
mapper.select: select DISTINCT c.id,c.name,c.url,c.parent_id,c.parent_ids,c.img_url from sys_user_role a inner join sys_role_permission b on a.role_id=b.role_id inner join sys_permission c on c.id=b.permission_id inner join sys_user d on a.id=d.id where c.resource_type='menu' and c.available=0 and d.username=#{userName} and c.parent_id=#{parentId}
